DOC.detailed_description: A randomized Phase 3 , placebo-controlled multi-center study evaluate safety , efficacy tolerability Hydrocodone Bitartrate controlled-release capsule subject chronic low back pain . Subjects go open-label conversion titration phase follow randomized double-blind treatment phase Hydrocodone ( HC ) -Controlled-Release ( CR ) v . Placebo . The trial consist Screening Phase ( 14 day ) , open-label Conversion Titration Phase ( 6 week ) , 12-week placebo-controlled Treatment Phase , 2-week Follow-Up Phone Call
